title: 01 = Zero one. [Ep. 72/13]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Oil refining. 2. Telescope reflector manufacture. 3. Design and manufacture of the H4 halygon lamp. 4. Tree surgery using plastic compounds. 5. Microprobes for tissue analysis. 6. Electric fence to prevent shark attack.
